pages.text: $(l:tools/drone)Drones/$ have an internal buffer of 100,000 FE (Forge Energy).  Using this widget, you can export energy from the Drone's storage to an energy-providing block (e.g. a $(item)Thermal Expansion Energy Cell/$ or $(item)Immersive Engineering Capacitor/$).$(p)$(italic)Despite its name, this widget exports FE (Forge Energy), not RF (Redstone Flux). The name is historical./$
